MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY4 postcode area of Cowdenbeath. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:44pm. Our emergency response team have arrived at Woodend Place substation to investigate a possible blown fuse and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:45pm. When we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:46pm on Saturday, 16 January 2021
